overview.objective: Our objective was to build out the new front-end of the Amazon App Store via HTML and CSS. We worked on and off-site with their designers and backend developers to integrate the new UI. We optimized the app for performance while while working through the many Android browser quirks.

tools.overview: Besides using the core web technologies, we had to learn Amazon's custom build environment. We worked with their developers to integrate our code directly into their server-side platform.
